lead_paragraph: The Broncos released the veteran defensive lineman Simeon Rice before the end of practice. The 33-year-old Rice signed a one-year, $3 million contract Sept. 3. He chose Denver in part because of the opportunity for more playing time after the starter Ebenezer Ekuban sustained a season-ending Achilles’ injury in training camp.
